summary: Chevaleresse II by yurica :) I converted to HDT for breast and butt bounce.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][i][b]Chevaleresse II by yurica :) I converted to HDT for breast and butt bounce.


This mod adds a set of Divine Steel heavy armor and greatsword to the game.

The armor and weapon are equal to Daedric level and can be upgraded as usual. The helmet uses an invisible mesh for heavy armor set bonus only.


[/b][/i]Required
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/? (HDT)

[/color]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/? (HDT High heel system)
author: Danikitty
